WorkflowInfo.Name: Create a Cisco Version Report
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process creates a version report of a list of cisco routers.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:StartCiscoSession;Assembly=StartCiscoSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:EnablePrivilegedCommands;Assembly=EnablePrivilegedCommands, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:SendCiscoCommand;Assembly=SendCiscoCommand, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:TerminateCiscoSession;Assembly=TerminateCiscoSession, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="3" TableName="RoutersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="RouterIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="RouterName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.10</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterNorth</RouterName>
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.11</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterSouth</RouterName>
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.12</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterWest</RouterName>
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <RouterIP>192.168.1.13</RouterIP>
 <RouterName>RouterEast</RouterName>
 <Version />
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%RoutersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="RoutersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="RouterIP" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%RoutersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="RoutersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns7:StartCiscoSession IsValid="True" x:Name="startCiscoSession1" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%RouterIP%" SecureConnection="1" DisplayName="Start Cisco Session" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Starts Cisco Session." HostId="-2" TypeName="StartCiscoSession" UserName="" StartSession="{x:Null}" /><ns8:EnablePrivilegedCommands SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="enablePrivilegedCommands1" HostName="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:00:10" DisplayName="Enable Privileged Commands" SwitchPassword="5845646A4359425663557075667950413776487461413D3D" OSType="0" TimeInSeconds="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Enable cisco privileged commands" HostId="0" TypeName="EnablePrivilegedCommands" /><ns9:SendCiscoCommand SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="CiscoVersion" HostName="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="Send Cisco Command" TheCommand="show version" OSType="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Sends cisco command." HostId="0" TypeName="SendCiscoCommand" /><ns10:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%CiscoVersion%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%RoutersList%" x:Name="setCellValue1" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /><ns11:TerminateCiscoSession SessionName="startCiscoSession1" x:Name="terminateCiscoSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate Cisco Session" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Terminate Cisco session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateCiscoSession" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns2:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Seconds" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TypeName="GetDate" DisplayName="Get Date" TimeZone="120" TimeZoneIDS="{x:Null}" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZoneIsInDaylightSavingTime="{x:Null}" TimeToAdd="0" /><ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%RoutersList%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Cisco Version Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%convertToHTMLTable1%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
